title: You Get Straight To The Answers!
description:
Madeline recently discovered Dr. Laura for the first time and has a BIG thank you after hearing her words of wisdom. - Dr. Laura: "Don't eat the poison just because you're hungry."

How have my Words of Wisdom helped you? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment. 

Find me on social media at:
